record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, there will now be a period for the transaction of morning business for 60 minutes, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each, with the time equally divided and controlled between the two leaders or their designees, with the Republicans controlling the first half and the majority controlling the final half.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to speak for up to 20 minutes within our allotment of morning business.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
